1.0.1.en: minor fixes to translations, remaining duration is now shown at the correct capability
1.0.1.nl: kleine verbeteringen van de Nederlandse vertaling, resterende beregeningsduur wordt in het correcte veld getoond

1.2.1.en: Fixes some small bugs, correct watering duration is now used.

1.2.3.en: Fixed crashes that occured in last week. New capability is now automatically added when the app is re-started.

1.4.0.en: Added possibility to add multiple accounts

1.5.0.en: Added possiblity to set the watering duration in the app and via a flow.
